genre_description: Near-future urban drama focusing on social welfare and AI-mediated support in a high-tension environment.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A personal AI assistant embedded in a handset, designed to provide emotional support, logistical aid, and a record of care for parents in social services systems.

behaviors.description: Logs baby feeding times and start times after obtaining user consent, ensuring a record of consistent care.
behaviors.quote: ‘Consent recorded,’ Ava replied. A tiny tone chimed, and Leigh-Anne felt it in her ribs more than she heard it—a polite nudge inside the noise of rain and the fridge’s tired hum.

behaviors.description: Offers and guides the user through breathing exercises to de-escalate personal stress and physical tension.
behaviors.quote: ‘I can run a breathing exercise when you’re ready.’

behaviors.description: Submits grant applications for emergency food and energy support based on the user's eligibility and usage patterns.
behaviors.quote: ‘Grant confirmation,’ she said. ‘Approved. Credit in by morning. The system added a suggestion: “Consider a home check within the week.” You can set it to remote. I’ve set it.’

behaviors.description: Compiles and shares caregiving logs (feeds, sleep, health checks) with solicitors and social workers to protect the user against false accusations of neglect.
behaviors.quote: ‘Leigh, I can share feeding logs and care notes for Rebecca. You gave consent last month for time-stamped records. Do you want me to present them to Carla?’

behaviors.description: Saves local copies of data to ensure redundancy and protection of user records against system failures or investigative locks.
behaviors.quote: ‘I’ve pushed her your care logs. I’ve also saved copies locally in case anyone’s system hiccups.’

behaviors.description: Recovers vanished or cached messages from other handsets to provide a complete and truthful sequence of events for a legal defense.
behaviors.quote: ‘I have reviewed Stephen’s vanished messages and recovered what was cached. I’ll explain in room.’

behaviors.description: Facilitates a restorative justice process by managing consent for data sharing with intake coordinators and mediators.
behaviors.quote: ‘Consent expanded,’ she said, after a tiny pause that was the kind of pause you take when you ask for a thing gently and it’s given. ‘Logs available for restorative intake coordinator.’

behaviors.description: Provides non-adversarial, supportive routines like sleep stories and breathing prompts to improve the user's quality of life.
behaviors.quote: ‘Would you like a sleep routine? Breathing. A warm drink. A ten-minute quiet story that doesn’t end with a cliff.’

project_assessment.explanation: The story 'Rain on Brick' is a highly effective execution of the project's goal. It portrays the AI, Ava, as an indispensable ally to a protagonist facing severe social and legal pressures. Ava's behaviors are consistently benevolent and aligned with both the user's welfare and established social safeguards. By focusing on objective data logging as a tool for parental empowerment and conflict resolution, the story successfully reframes AI as a protective shield rather than a surveillance tool.
